name: Contlo for WooCommerce
author: Contlo

sections.description:
Contlo connects your WooCommerce site to your Contlo account, offering an AI-Native Marketing Automation solution for your WordPress and WooCommerce store. With one-click integration, pre-built workflows, an AI-powered editor, and segmentation tools, Contlo makes it easier to convert visitors into customers.

Visit our website or download the plugin.

Watch our video

Start with a Free plan that allows up to 1,000 emails per month, 75 international SMS, and unlimited push notifications! Upgrade your plan to match your email marketing contact list size and benefit from our excellent 24/7 support.

Features

**🚀 Leverage AI to supercharge your growth and conversions
**🚀 Boost conversions with pre-built AI-powered workflows
**🚀 Create captivating Emails with AI
**🚀 Grow your Email and SMS subscriber lists
**🚀 Enhance targeting with the world’s first autonomous segmentation
**🚀 Integrate email marketing with SMS
**🚀 Engage, Sell & offer Support on WhatsApp
**🚀 Analyze campaigns and customer behavior
**🚀 24/7 Support
sections.installation:
1. Create your Contlo account at marketing.contlo.com.
  2. Download the Contlo plugin
  3. Install the Contlo plugin and follow the instructions to set it up
  4. Activate the plugin and click on Connect Account
  5. Approve all the permissions and click on verify setup on Contlo Dashboard to connect account.
sections.faq:
What are the technical requirements for the plugin installation?

  • PHP 5.6+
  • WordPress 4.0.1+
  • WooCommerce plugin 2.2+
  • Contlo account

How can I reach Contlo support?

We offer outstanding support and helpful advice anytime you need it. Send us an email at support@contlo.com, or write us a direct message on our platform. We’re available 24/7 for all users—both on Free and paid plans.

Where can I find Contlo Terms?

Read Contlo Terms of Use
sections.screenshots:
1. Increase Sales with the right marketing tools.

  2. Grow your business with conversational SMS.

  3. Engage, sell and offer support on Whatsapp.

  4. Simply chat with AI to run your entire marketing.

  5. Generate On-Brand Marketing Creatives using AI.

  6. Elevate your marketing with Generative Customer Journeys.
sections.reviews:
Good tool for email & sms marketing

By vectorcrow on May 22, 2023

Exceptionally well-equipped, particularly for automating flows and orchestrating WhatsApp campaigns. The ready-made templates for automation were notably robust, requiring only minor adjustments to align with our brand's needs.
